data.title: Why investors may want to be careful with AI trades in December
data.description: After being pummeled earlier in the month, a number of the big-name AI stocks have recovered a good part of their losses as November comes to a close. Marketgauge.com chief strategist Michele Schneider, Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Ines Ferré, and Envestnet Solutions co-chief investment officer and group president Dana D’Auria discuss what they're watching in the AI trade. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
